collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (6 total Queries, 6 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `tbl_classes`.*, `tbl_grade_levels`.`level_name`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_enrollments WHERE class_id = tbl_classes.id AND status = "Ativo") as enrolled_count FROM `tbl_classes` JOIN `tbl_grade_levels` ON `tbl_grade_levels`.`id` = `tbl_classes`.`grade_level_id` WHERE `tbl_classes`.`is_active` = 1 AND `tbl_classes`.`academic_year_id` = '2' ORDER BY `tbl_classes`.`class_name` ASC

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `tbl_classes`.*, `tbl_grade_levels`.`level_name`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_enrollments WHERE class_id = tbl_classes.id AND status = "Ativo") as enrolled_count FROM `tbl_classes` JOIN `tbl_grade_levels` ON `tbl_grade_levels`.`id` = `tbl_classes`.`grade_level_id` WHERE `tbl_classes`.`is_active` = 1 AND `tbl_classes`.`academic_year_id` = '2' ORDER BY `tbl_classes`.`class_name` ASC
